name: Codemancer (itch)
description:
You are a dwarven engineer that has fallen deep into the caves of the world! Build and program defensive tower to protect your treasure!

Hello! Thanks for checking out my game!

I made this game over the course of around 3 days for the 4th Wowie Game Jam. It's a side scrolling tower defense... but you must code the towers yourself! The theme was "Collaborating with AI."

I have to admit, it's definitely lacking polish. I would have liked to have added more to this game, (especially things like if statements and for/while loops) but I simply did not have enough time. Oh well, great jam!
